attributes.action: London Black Cabs v Uber and Mini Cabs
attributes.additional_details:
London Black Taxi have been on London Streets for 300 years. We have all studied for up to 5 years to become Londons best drivers and not rely on satnavs
Uber and addison lee and others are using apps to hail taxi's and this is against the law as it stands under the law mini cabs and private hire need to be booked via an office and not direct to drivers that are driving round waiting for passengers to use an app and this should be band in london

London Taxi's are unique to London. Both tourists and Londoners rely on the trade everyday lets make a stand and Keep London Taxi's on the streets for another 300 years
